reviews.review:
Portal 2 is a worthy sequel to the first game. Although it does a poorer job of mixing story with gameplay, both the former and the latter are better than they were in the first game; Portal 2 sports more characters, although our old friend GLaDOS makes a return as a main character and is still the most likable in the game. There's a host of new gameplay mechanics, such as propulsion, repulsion, and conversion gel, all substances that either propel the player into the air, speed up the player's movements, or makes a surface portal-a-ble. This game also provides to us what I consider to be one of the best endings in gaming history, at least for the single player campaign, which leads me to my next point: there's more than one campaign! Portal 2's cooperative campaign thrusts you and another player into the position of Atlas and P-Body, GLaDOS' personal testing androids. You'll solve very complex test chambers with a friend, and it proves to be a true meeting of the minds as you combine your intellect to complete these puzzles and achieve a strong sense of satisfaction afterwards. Aside from this, it is also worth noting that thanks to the Perpetual Testing Initiative, a free map editor fully equipped with workshop support, this game's replay ability is now as infinite as its community's imagination.

TL;DR

Better than the original, definitely worth your money.
Хороший сингл, интересное совместное прохождение

I had heard about this game a long time ago, but I disbelieved that it could be fun. Well, I change my mind after buying Portal 1 & 2 at the end of 2011 year. It's a very addicting game! Highly recommended if you are into puzzles and brain games!
Just as amazing as the first, longer campaign and has a pretty solid story line with lots of new puzzles and things to figure out. 10/10

I normally would not recommend a triple A game, becuase they get the spotlight and if you cared enought about them you would keep it on your radar. Portal 1 was universally praised and this...

Quite simply, it improves on every single element of the original. The story is more intriguing. It starts out in similar fashion to the original, with test subject Chell forced into a battle of wits against malevolent, cold calculating GLaDOS, but grows so much more. It's difficult to explain without spoiling it but it features a number of characters with famous voice actors whilst maintaining the lonely atmosphere of a rat trapped in a cage. It's funnier than the original too. GLaDOS remains the star but characters such as Wheatley and Cave Johnson will leave a lasting impression.

The puzzles are great, leaving you completely stumped one moment and feeling like a genius the next. There's few highs in video games and this won my heart and placed it as my top game of 2011.
I guess it's good.
再也找不到另一个联机这么有意思的游戏了，对于喜欢动脑子的玩家来说绝对不容错过！！！

First Person shooter !
if i gonna get marry one day, i'll make sure she play this with me first !!

Its f*cking Portal 2. Its better than the first in every way. EVERY SINGLE WAY. It introduces like 6-7 new gameplay mechanics that get worked into and around the concept of portals. The story/plot is approximately 3 times longer than the first game, AND theres a co-op mode which has its own side-plot (and DLC now). Theres plenty of humor, and youll want to play it about 2 full times to catch everything in the game. Also leaderboards give you the added challenge of beating certain time/portal usage levels (although it would be nice to have a Bronze/Silver/Gold rating or something of the like). Once you finish all of that, you can start downloading user made maps and puzzles (Theres plenty of both single player and co-op), or perhaps design your own in the hammer editor.

Seriously, if you like puzzle games, pick this up right now, it does not disappoint

If you liked Portal -- and you really, really should have -- this is muthafuckin' Portal DOS. It's what you loved about the first game, except the game is much longer, new has a bunch of new puzzle elements, more character, more characterS, and multiplayer. And, uh, hats for P-Body and Atlas, in case you actually give a shit about that sort of thing. All in all, it is a worthy sequel, and somehow met its fans' great expectations.

A few things that suck though: No blood. Turrets and lasers are hardly dangerous at all anymore. Cake isn't mentioned even once. Portal surface goo doesn't make so much sense. And finally, a big lack of interactivity with the little things in the environment like pretty much every other Source game.

Lepsi nez jednicka :) a plus pro me konecne v cestine. Ma to malinkou navaznost do jednicky ,ale neni to podminka ji hrat. Ovsem tahle hra je pro ty co si radi popremysli a dokonce si obcas zasmejou :)

LOLROFLMFAO THIS SHIT IS JUST SO RANDOM I HAVE TO FREQUENTLY STOP PLAYING IT AS SOON AS I START BECAUSE MY FUCKING STOMACH BEGINS TO IMPLODE WITH SUCH ZANY RANDOM HUMOR! I HAVE TO ALSO CHANGE MY UNDERWEAR QUITE OFTEN BECAUSE IT NORMALLY ESCALATES TO BEING THAT FUNNY!
Great puzzle game, isn't too bizar difficult. Good story and great ending. I played the game in a mere 4 to 5 hours. It isn't a big game, but definitely worth your time.

Portal 2 is an excellent mind game, an incredible improvement on Portal and is lots of fun to play. Holding true to the original with new inovations I found myself wondering what was next, and there are little surprises along the way. I f you like Portal you will absolutely love Portal 2, Did I mention the graphics kick!!  Game  play is smooth and clean, Put this one on your list if you haven't done it, better yet, just buy it!
A bit short but amazingly funny. This game will BURN YOUR HOUSE DOWN.

FPS puzzle game. Very satisfying experience once complete, but it is fundamentally a puzzle. What enables it to work is the difficulty pacing is perfect, and the puzzles are logical rather than abstract.
Best game ever.... no joke

Ｐｏｒｔａｌシリーズ第2弾の本作は前作と比べてもストーリーのボリュームも、
パズル要素も格段に向上しており、非常に満足できる作品の一つです。

ストーリーも日本語に対応しており楽しみながらゲームを進めることが出来ます。
ギミックも増えているので、悩みながらもじっくり進めることが出来ます。
前作もプレイしているとより楽しめるのではないでしょうか。

おじさんScore　85/100
コスパ満足度　88/100　（Valve製品なのでセールで安価になり易いです。）
Get it for that 10 hour airplane ride when the plane doesn't have the little screens on the back of each seat; this will entertain you for that long and more.

Un jeu drôle et intelligent, qui vaudra quand même quelques prises de têtes pour arriver à bout des défis ardus mis en place par la terrible GlaDOS. Bien joué Valve ! (et la chanson de fin de Portal 2 vaut de l'or. Bon pas autant que Still Alive, mais elle vaut son pesant de brouzoufs quand même.)

It's more Portal.  IT'S MORE PORTAL.  MORE PORTAL, MOORE!
It's not as good as the first one but it definitely will help satisfy those Portal cravings. There needs to be more games where the main antagonists both love you and love to kill you.
Интересная игра. Хорошая графика и озвучка.
An awesome expansion to the first game. More of the same puzzles you love with advanced challenges and even more humor! Get it!
top kaufen los ^^

Un Must Have, divertente, intellettualmente "impegnato" e con quel tocco di sarcasmo che ti fa sorridere anche se sai di essere preso in giro.
Un motore grafico "vecchio" ma che non trema dinnanzi a nessun rivale facendo egregiamente la sua bella figura Next-Gen. Da avere!
esto es increible, que genios estos de valve por dios!
Well worth the money, buy the original if you havent played it, from start to finish its puzzeling and astounding. well done valve *claps*
For science... you monster!
First I was like ;| its over already then I was like :O it isn't over yet!

For fans of the original Portal this game definately lives up to its hype. Introducing even more ways than before to use your portal gun and magnificent puzzle areas, I recommend this game and its predecessor to any who love a good challenge.
Increible.

Still no sign of any cake..!

I bought the first Portal for nothing and the second for £5, and since that is cheaper than the price of a cinema ticket, this game is well worth it.

The puzzles seem easier than the first game, and it only took 9 hours to complete but the story is sheer joy. The finale's payoff is probably the best of any game I have ever played.

I hope there is localisation in other languages, because the English is just superb.

Not sure if the replayability will be there for collecting all the achievements but if you can appreciate the humour this is highly recommended. More frustrating than the first, because not sure how many of the puzzles will need spoilers to solve

7/10
In my top 3. Impressive storytelling, fun co-op, mentally challenging. Definetly innovative! Does not resort to violence to entertain. At least, not much of it.
无论剧情、画面、可玩性均属3A级作品
Toda una experiencia inolvidable. Te mantiene con una sonrisa desde el principio hasta el final.
The best follow-up to Portal 1 you could ever imagine.  Plus, dat ending!
WTB Cake!
Portal 2 takes everything that made the first Portal great, adds new elements, and succeeds on all levels! It's absolutely amazing! A must play!

I have played this alone and with friends and also even with my kid, this is a great one or two time game play game, wouldn't say buy it at full price but if on sale grab it. It is a great game for anyone from young to old novice to pro, all will like this game in there list!

This really is a great game; all of the hype is not unfounded. The thick sci-fi atmosphere, compounded with the amazing techno-cinematic soundtrack will give any sci-fi lover a run for his money. The story is absolutely solid, building on the first game, while still retaining a level of mystery. The characters are fun (especially GLaDOS and her snarkiness) and the post-apocalyptic atmosphere is very well done.
In terms of actual gameplay, I must say that the puzzles are awesome and challenging, but when you get to some extra-testing areas, it feels like the game is pulling you along. If you have'nt played either game, do yourself a favor and play the first one.
The sequel to one of the most imaginative games ever made! Great gameplay, engaging storyline and a delicious add-on: co-op.
Best single player story line I've ever played! The writing is absolutely phenomenal and the story line is full of exciting twists that leave you on the edge of your seat, just waiting for more!
Acheter-le si vous ne l'avez pas encore il est trop génial^^
Even with all the amazing games that came out in 2011, this is easily my 2011 Game of the Year.

Great game! Worth every penny! 
I also recommend you to play coop in split screen mod by using console codes. [10/10]
AWESOME

The heart of Portal 2 lies in its brilliant writing and layered puzzles. There are definitely some challenging moments and the humour is genuine without being forced. This is definitely a game that I would put down in my list of all-time favs.

I'd write a science joke, but I took an arrow to the cake.



You know. Because IT WAS A LIE.
Like the first game, but far bigger and with more character. Portal took me 3 hours to beat. This game, excluding co-operative multiplayer, was almost 10 hours long! Buy it and the first game now!
La trama engancha y sorprende los giros de la historia.
One of the best games ever made.

At first Portal 2 was a chore to play through all because of the loading, a some points in the beggining the loading was longer than the puzzles! But you got to give it some time and it'll grow on you. The best part for me is the story and the characters which are without a doubt the funniest I've seen this year. It's definitively worth the money and the time.

9.3/10
Addicting yet still some brains are required.
Beat the SP, was lots of fun and genuinely funny.
Probably the best puzzle game I have ever played.
Este videojuego, es simplemente una maravilla...
Holt es euch! :D

Tanto o primeiro como esse são ótimos. Muitos desafios, alguns, tem que se pensar bastante.

Want your brain to start thinking? Then this is the ideal game.
Portal 2 is an adventure that starts with you and your portal gun.
It has a good story line, and at times even funny.
Puzzles are getting thougher after a while with many variations.
If you want to go for a challenge, Buy this.
Отличнейшая игра! И без всяких зомби :)

Its hard for me to explain the feeling i get from playing this game.  Its the first game ive played in a long time that gives me the same feeling i got when playing  supermario world for the first time in snes.  The game knows its a game and has its borders defined very well.  Gameplay feels exactly like what it should be gameplay and puzzles give a feeling of acomplishment when completed thats rare to rind in games these days.
Sehr Gut!

After I was Initially sceptical about the first part of portal I played Portal during 2011 and it made a lot of fun. Therefore I decided to start playing Portal 2 with a friend in Coop and it was a delightful experience indeed. Anyone who's into solving physics puzzles should have a look at this game.

While not as revolutionary as the first Portal.  This one adds new mechanics and more of that juicy portal goodness that we've come to love.  Also, who can resist Stephen Merchant's voice acting?!??.  Just play it - you'll be glad you did.
Great game, just a bit short.
